Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    This class receives user input and processes this input
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jared Weyer

      private java.lang.String userStr
      userStr is the user string input
      "y" indicates not to roll the die

      "n" indicates to roll the die
